import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get all room status types"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v2.0/locations/rooms/status-types"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns all available room status types (for example, Active, Inactive, Under Maintenance). Use this when configuring room creation or when displaying status selectors.

**Workflow Example**
1. Fetch status types: [GET /api/v2.0/locations/rooms/status-types](/docs/api/locations/get-all-location-room-status-types).
2. Use the returned IDs in room create/update requests.

**Minimal Required Fields**: None.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Bearer token for authentication"},{"name":"SiteId","in":"header","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Site context for the request"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Status types retrieved successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response containing a list of room status types.","properties":{"Items":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Status type for location rooms (e.g., Active, Inactive, Under Maintenance)","properties":{"LocationRoomStatusTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the status type"},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name for the status type"}},"required":["LocationRoomStatusTypeId","Name"],"title":"LocationRoomStatusType"},"description":"List of status types"},"IsSuccessful":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the request was successful"},"StatusCode":{"type":"integer","description":"HTTP status code"},"Messages":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"string"},"description":"Status or error messages"}},"required":["IsSuccessful","StatusCode"],"title":"LocationRoomStatusTypeListResponse"},"example":{"Items":[{"LocationRoomStatusTypeId":"22222222-2222-2222-2222-222222222222","Name":"Active"},{"LocationRoomStatusTypeId":"55555555-5555-5555-5555-555555555555","Name":"Inactive"},{"LocationRoomStatusTypeId":"66666666-6666-6666-6666-666666666666","Name":"Under Maintenance"}],"IsSuccessful":true,"StatusCode":200}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
